page.title: 03THE ARMED FORCES
page.content: The radar station at Boulmer is situated just outside our block but has such an influence on our lives that we must include it.Established in 1945,as an airfield,its function was changed to that of a radar station in 1950.The station employs 650 servicemen and also operates a first class air_sea rescue service.The quarters at Longhoughton accomodate 500 personnel ,which has helped to develop the area.The community centre, financed and run by the R.A.F. accomodates a great many clubs and societies,including a playgroup.All these facilities are also used by civilian residents.The local shop or N.A.A.F.I.is also R.A.F.financed and can supply almost everthing from electrical goods to groceries.
